forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 47F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 63F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low near 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 65F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
